title: Feeling Nervous? How to Stop Procrastinating on Your Ideas
description:
Have you been trying to tap into your creativity or skills, and finding ways to make income with it, even if that’s just in your spare time?

Thought about freelancing or using your talents to make supplemental income on the side… only to let your nerves, or all that you don’t know, get the best of you?

It’s one thing to have a little dream, idea, or even straight up need for extra income… it’s another thing to actually take that first step into going for it!

It’s scary to put yourself out there and start doing something new, especially something that feels uncertain or risky...especially in a very volatile time like this!

We often hear it talked about like, “go big, or go home,” but Jordan just started small, from home, technically.

And she found that doesn’t have to be nearly as overwhelming as it seems.

Tune into this episode to learn:

  • Baby Steps to Getting Started on Your Big Ideas
  • 4 Tips To Help You Kick Nerves to the Curb and Take Action

… So that you can take baby steps of faith with wisdom, grace, and the heaps of courage that it really does take.

Psst. Sign Up for the Free Workshop Here: http://theownitacademy.com/wfh-workshop
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
